entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:13 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
